name: The Last Beetroot
description:
Made on Global Game Jam 2023

Play with Root, the Last Beetroot alive, fated to protect The Mother Tree from an alien invasion on his home vegetable planet. Acompanied by a potato gun, Root is the last hope for his people!  Inspired by action shooters, experiment with powerups, patrons and other bonus to defend your world!

Credits:

AlysonKof (Character Artist / Animator)

Diogo Stolfo Music (Sound Designer)

Erick Torres - CanvasDEV (Programmer)
